item.title: Appetizers
item.description: LIST FROM #appetizer WHERE file.name != "Sous-Vide Recipe" WHERE file.name != "Traditional Recipe" SORT file.name DESC appetizer.

item.title: avocado-crab-appetizer
item.description: Avocado Crab Appetizer appetizer recipe traditional INFO Delicious little marvel by Jean-Pierre Vigato Ingredients 1-2 Tbsp of Mayo 1 Tbsp of Heavy Cream 1 Avocado 1 can of crab or fresh crab 2-3 tomatoes Scallions 1 Lemon Ginger Cilantro Basil or leeks (3-4 leaves or so, for the leeks use the yello...

item.title: Recipes Index
item.description: LIST FROM #recipe WHERE file.name != "Sous-Vide Recipe" WHERE file.name != "Traditional Recipe" SORT file.name DESC.
